Hexham, Northumberland, England, UK
Prizes - 1st £15, 2nd £10, 3rd £7.10s. March contest - 1st(£6) Crookhall, 2nd (£4) North Seaton, 3rd(£2) Hexham. Promoted by Hexham Stay at Home Holiday Committee. 3 bands competed.
